title: Amicus curiae briefs used by interest groups

content.question: Which of the following is true of amicus curiae briefs?

choices.label: They are used by interest groups to lobby courts.
They are used exclusively by liberal interest groups.
They are used exclusively by conservative interest groups.
They are the means by which a litigant seeks Supreme Court review of a lower court decision.

content.answer: They are used by interest groups to lobby courts.
